articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Sends Message of Thanks to Vietnamese President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Sends Message of Thanks to Vietnamese President
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of thanks to Vietnamese President Truong Tan Sang on August 7, leaving the country after wrapping up his visit to it
					 The message expressed deep thanks to the president and the people of Vietnam for cordial hospitality. 
					
					 The message said:
					
					 This time we had an exchange of views on the issue of positively developing in line with the common ideal and interests the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two parties, two states and two peoples which have a long tradition and matters of mutual concern, and reached a consensus of views on them.
					
					 I express conviction that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between our two countries will grow stronger thanks to their joint efforts, considering that our meeting this time marked an important occasion in promoting the development of the bilateral relations.
					
					 I, availing myself of this opportunity, would like to sincerely hope that the friendly and fraternal people of your country will make greater achievements in the efforts to accomplish the cause of industrializing and modernizing the country earlier than scheduled by implementing the decisions made at the 11th party congress and, at the same time, you will enjoy good health, happiness and greater success in the performance of your heavy duty.

articles.title: Talks Held between Kim Yong Nam and Lao President
articles.content:
Talks Held between Kim Yong Nam and Lao President
 Vientiane, August 8 (KCNA Correspondent) -- Talks between Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, and Lao President Choummaly Sayasone were held at the Presidency on Wednesday.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, Kang Min Chol, minister of Mining Industry, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Han Pong Ho, DPRK ambassador to Laos, and other suite members.
					
					 Present there from the Lao side were Vice Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Thongloun Sisoulth, Minister and Secretary General of the Presidency Phongsavath Boupha, Minister of Industry and Commerce Nam Vignaket, the minister of Power and Mining Industry, Minister of Science and Technology Boviengkham Vangdala,      Kiettisak Keobanhdith, Lao ambassador to the DPRK, and officials concerned. 
					
					 Kim Yong Nam referred to the fact that the dear respected Kim Jong Un is wisely leading the party, state, army and people to the building of a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 It is the steadfast stand of the DPRK government to develop the traditional relations of friendship with Laos, he said.
					
					 He underscored need for the two countries to boost the bilateral relations and cooperation in international arena including the Non-aligned Movement.
					
					 Choummaly Sayasone said that he could never forget the cordial hospitality leader Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un accorded to him during his visit to the DPRK.
					
					 He warmly congratulated the Korean people on successfully holding celebrations of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He expressed the belief that the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il would become shining realities thanks to Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The talks proceeded in a friendly atmosphere.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Lao PM
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Lao PM
 Vientiane, August 8 (KCNA Correspondent) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday met and had a talk with Thongsing Thammavong, prime minister of Laos.
					 Present there from DPRK side were Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, Kang Min Chol, minister of Mining Industry, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Han Pong Ho, DPRK ambassador to Laos, and other suite members.
					
					 Present there from the Lao side were Sinlavong Khoutphaythoun, minister the Prime Minister's Office and head of its Cabinet, Phongsavath Boupha, minister and secretary general of the Presidency, Sounthon Sayachak, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Kiettisak Keobanhdith, Lao ambassador to the DPRK, and officials concerned.
					
					 The prime minister of Laos said that the friendly relations between the two countries provided by President Kaysone Phomvihane and President Kim Il Sung have been steadily developed by Khamtay Siphandone and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He noted that the friendly relations between Laos and DPRK are developing day by day thanks to Choummaly Sayasone and the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He said that the Korean people are registering great successes in the struggle for protecting the gains of the revolution and defending the country under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Welcomed in Vientiane
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Welcomed in Vientiane
 Vientiane, August 8 (KCNA Correspondent) -- A function took place at the Lao Presidential Office on Wednesday to welcome Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on an official goodwill visit to Laos.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, Kang Min Chol, minister of Mining Industry, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Han Pong Ho, DPRK ambassador to Laos, and other suite members.
					
					 Lao President Choummaly Sayasone, Vice Prime Minister Asang Laoly, Vice Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Thongloun Sisoulth, Standing Vice Prime Minister Somsavath Lengsavath, Minister and Secretary General of the Presidency Phongsavath Boupha, Minister of Industry and Commerce Nam Vignaket, the Minister of Power and Mining Industry, Minister of Science and Technology Boviengkham Vangdala , Lao Ambassador to the DPRK Kiettisak Keobanhdith and officials concerned were on hand.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam together with Choummaly Sayasone reviewed a guard of honor of the the Lao People's Army.

articles.title: DPRK, Lao Sign Inter-Governmental Agreements
articles.content:
DPRK, Lao Sign Inter-Governmental Agreements
 Vientiane, August 8 (KCNA Correspondent) -- Agreements between the governments of the DPRK and Laos were signed with due ceremonies at the Presidency on Wednesday.
					 Present at the signing ceremonies from the DPRK side were Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, Kang Min Chol, minister of Mining Industry, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Han Pong Ho, DPRK ambassador to Laos, and other suite members and from the Lao side were President Choummaly Sayasone, Minister of Science and Technology Boviengkham Vangdala, a vice-minister of Information, Culture and Tourism, a vice-minister of Education and Sports and officials concerned.
					
					 The DPRK minister of Foreign Trade and the Lao minister of Science and Technology inked the "Inter-governmental agreement on exchange and cooperation in the fields of information and technology" and the DPRK vice-foreign minister and Lao vice-minister of Information, Culture and Tourism the "Inter-governmental plan of cultural exchange for 2012-2015."
					
					 Also signed on the same day were "MOU on educational cooperation between the Education Commission of the DPRK and the Ministry of Education and Sports of Laos" and the "Agreement on cooperation between chambers of commerce."

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Congratulates Serbian PM
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Congratulates Serbian PM
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Ivica Dacic upon his appointment as prime minister of Serbia.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Serbia would further develop, wishing the prime minister success in his fresh work for stability and development of the country.
					
					 DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun also sent a similar message to Ivan Mrkic upon his appointment as foreign minister of Serbia on the same day.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Greets Cambodian FM
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Greets Cambodian FM
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Hor Nam Hong, deputy prime minister and minister of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation of Cambodia, on August 7 on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of the Association of South East Asian Nations (ASEAN).
					 The message said:
					
					 ASEAN has developed into a powerful regional organization steering regional peace, prosperity, cooperation and security, while maintaining the principles of respect for sovereignty, equality and reciprocity and non-interference in others' internal affairs for the last 45 years since its foundation.
					
					 The message evaluated the position and the role of ASEAN rising day by day in the regional and international area and reaffirmed the stand of the DPRK to positively cooperate with ASEAN to build independent, peaceful and prosperous Asia.
					
					 The message wished him greater success in his responsible work, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relationship between the DPRK and ASEAN and its member nations would steadily grow stronger.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Congratulates FM of Montenegro
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Congratulates FM of Montenegro
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Nebojsa Kaluderovic upon his appointment as minister of Foreign Affairs and European Integration of Montenegro.
					 Pak in his message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would favorably develop, wishing the minister successes in his work for the development of the external relations of the country.

articles.title: Truth about US, S. Korean Abduction and Terrorism Disclosed
articles.content:
Truth about US, S. Korean Abduction and Terrorism Disclosed
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The National Reunification Institute Tuesday released a statement telling before the world the whole story about the allurement, abduction, plots, attempted terrorism, subversive and sabotage activities of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime.
					 The statement said: 
					
					 Finding it hard to stifle the DPRK through blockade, sanctions and military pressure for decades, the U.S. has conspired with the south Korean puppet regime in its desperate moves to destabilize and bring down the social system in the DPRK in recent years. 
					
					 In April this year the south Korean diplomatic chief at a meet-the press openly admitted that the basic orientation of the "policy towards the north" followed by the U.S. and the south Korean authorities so far was to force it to dismantle its nukes and missiles but they decided to pursue "a new method of access to the north" focusing on "bringing down the social system in the north in the days ahead."
					
					 They worked out a four-phase "scenario for bringing down the social system." Its first phase is to lure and abduct its citizens and let them undergo training for terrorism and destructive activities as there are no organized dissident forces in the DPRK. Its second phase is to infiltrate them into the DPRK again to form dissident forces. Its third phase is to provide them with weapons so that they can carry out various forms of terrorism, destruction, sabotage and armed revolt. Its fourth phase calls on the U.S. to start military intervention under the pretext of "contingency" and "protection of human rights" in a bid to bring down the social system in the north. 
					
					 The U.S. has long prodded the "National Foundation for Democracy" under the veil of NGO into conducting luring and abducting operations against citizens of the DPRK in areas close to its northern border.
					
					 The foundation has carried on these operations, financing "The Citizens Alliance for Human Rights in the North", "Network for Democracy in the North", "Turi Hana" and other anti-DPRK conspiratorial organizations in south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. provides at least 20 million U.S. dollars to those organizations every year.
					
					 The puppet regime does not conceal its premeditated and organized allurement and abduction operations, terming the acts of luring residents in areas near the northern border of the DPRK and taking them away to south Korea as "planned operations for making them defect to south Korea." 
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak regime has spent so far 309.7 million U.S. dollars for the above-said operations.
					
					More than 3,000 south Korean agents are going under the mask of missionaries in the Northeast area of China to lure and abduct residents of the DPRK.
					
					 Chon Ki Won disguised as a clergyman of the Missionary Society of "Turi Hana", confessed that he lured and abducted more than 900 citizens of the DPRK and took them away to south Korea from 1990 to 2009.
					
					 Wicked renegade Kim Yong Hwan, boss of an anti-DPRK conspiratorial organization, and other guys were arrested by the Chinese security authorities in March this year while conducting those operations.
					
					 When they find it hard to take DPRK citizens to south Korea, they bring them to a third country.
					
					 When agents of the U.S. and south Korea lure and abduct them, they employ such method as pressurizing all their families and relatives into "defecting to south Korea" in groups by holding them hostage. 
					
					 Allurement and abduction operations are also conducted under the signboard of "exchange of separated families through a third country."
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet regime are abducting even people of the DPRK aboard wrecked ships and taking them away to south Korea.
					
					 Those who find no means of living in south Korea after being taken there get degenerated. They either choose to commit crimes or suicides or flee to a third country.
					
					The south Korean regime is conspiring with the U.S. in driving the defectors to south Korea and wicked renegades into hatching plots against the DPRK and subversive and sabotage activities against it.
					
					 There are at least 300 organizations engaged in such activities organized with those defectors to south Korea.
					
					The puppet regime selects wicked renegades and take them to the U.S. so that they may get special education and training. They gather confidential information about the DPRK through the above-said organizations.
					
					 They are instigating the "Federation of the Movement for Freedom in the North" and other organizations of defectors to south Korea to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and scatter leaflets and broadcast programs distorting and slandering the socialist system in the DPRK and its policies.
					
					 Tens of millions of leaflets have been scattered hundreds of times through those defectors and renegades.
					
					 The then U.S. President Bush in September 2008 invited Pak Sang Hak, representative of the "Federation of the Movement for Freedom in the North" who took the lead in the leaflet scattering operations, to the White House. Bush told him not to lose courage, praising him for doing a tough job for the freedom of the north.
					
					 The U.S. let those wicked renegades appear at the White House, U.S. Congress and the UN to make what it called "testimonies." It stages such charade as awarding "human rights prize" to those who succeeded in reading its scripts.
					
					 The puppet regime provides more than ten million U.S. dollars to the anti-DPRK human rights organizations every year in an attempt to release "white paper on human rights record in the north" and "survey of human rights record in the north."
					
					 It is distributing documents on "human rights performance in the north" based on "false testimonies" made by renegades. It is also busy trumpeting about "human rights issue in the north" every day, holding photo exhibitions and seminars.
					
					  Movies have been produced to make a wrong picture of the "human rights record in the north" under the patronage of the south Korean regime.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet regime are staging psychological warfare through "Voice of Free North", "Broadcasting Service for Reforms in the North", "Voice of Free Korea", "Voice of Vast Plain" and other anti-DPRK broadcasting services operated by defectors to south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. invited Kim Song Min, representative of "Voice of Free North" who has played the worst role in the anti-DPRK broadcasting programs, to the White House several times, encouraging him to "implant liberalism into the minds of north Koreans."
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet regime formed a "death-defying action corps" with wicked defectors to south Korea and are hurling them into all forms of terrorism and subversive and sabotage activities against the DPRK.
					
					 Typical of them is the "Front for the Liberation of North Koreans" organized in September 2010. It specializes in gathering information about the north and destructive, sabotage and terrorist actions against major facilities.
					
					 This organization is directly involved in the recently disclosed attempted hideous terrorism to blow up statues symbolic of the dignity of the supreme leadership and monuments in the DPRK.
					
					 Beside this front there are cruel terrorist groups in south Korea such as the "Federation of Free Soldiers in the North" and the "Society for Demolition of Statues."
					
					 A defector to south Korea who is a member of the "society" confessed that he planned to destroy leader Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan secret camp but gave up the plan because of strengthened guard and difficulty in smuggling explosives in the area of the north.
					
					 All facts go to prove that the U.S. and the Lee regime's operations to lure and abduct DPRK citizens and their conspiratorial and terrorist acts against it have reached a dangerous phase.
					
					 The statement warned: 
					
					 They would be well advised to behave themselves, paying heed to the DPRK's warnings.  They should stop reckless crimes including hideous state-sponsored, politically-motivated terrorism.

articles.title: German Lawmaker Leaves for Home
articles.content:
German Lawmaker Leaves for Home
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Michael Luther, member of Bundestag from the Christian Democratic Union of Germany, and his companion left here on Wednesday.

articles.title: Messages and Letters from Various Countries
articles.content:
Messages and Letters from Various Countries
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received messages and letters from figures of various countries on the occasion of the 18th anniversary of the demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They included the chairman of the Central Executive Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Socialist Party of Bangladesh, the chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgys El" Republican Political Party, the chairman of the Communist Party of Germany, the chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, the chairman of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia, the chairman of the National Salvation Front of Russia, the chairwoman of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, the chairman of the Hungarian Communist Workers' Party, the first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Workers' Party of Belarus, the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party, the general secretary and the international relations secretary of the New Yugoslavia Communist Party, the chairman of the British Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist) and its vice-chai
					
					 rman who doubles as international relations secretary, and its general secretary, the spokesman (leader) of the Central Committee of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), the general secretary of the Unified Communist Party of Italy, the general secretary of the Movement for Peace and Socialism of Italy, the chairman of the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt, the chairman of the Arab Socialist Party of Egypt and the general secretary of the United Left Movement of Dominica.
					
					 Among them are also a member of the Central Executive Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, the vice-chairman of the Workers' Party of Turkey, a secretary of the Central Committee of the All-Union Communist Party of Bolsheviks, a secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Slovakia, the secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council who doubles as the director general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, the head of the "Orchestra of the 21st Century" of Russia, the chairman and the secretary general of the Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization, the deputy director general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea, a director of the European Regional Institute of the Juche Idea and other dignitaries in political, social, military and economic circles of various countries including China, Russia, Nepal, Myanmar, Bangladesh, Syria, Pakistan, Turkey, Iran, India, Denmark, Germany, Romani
					
					 a, Bulgaria, Switzerland, Sweden, Slovenia, Slovakia, the Czech Republic, France, Finland, Poland, the UK, Austria, Ukraine, Iceland, Italy, Nigeria, Benin, Democratic Congo, Egypt, Ethiopia, Chile and Peru. They also include representatives of international bodies, Juche idea study organizations and friendship organizations supporting Korea's reunification in those countries.
					
					 In the messages and letters they stressed the great feats of the President will be immortal as he founded the undying Juche idea and wisely led the Korean revolution and global independence.

articles.title: Congratulations from Russian Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Congratulations from Russian Political Party Leader
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message from S. M. Mironov, leader of A Just Russia, on August 2.
					 The message said:
					
					 I, on behalf of A Just Russia and on my own behalf, extend congratulations to you upon your receiving the title of DPRK Marshal.
					
					 We wish you signal successes in your responsible work for the country and people.

articles.title: Senior Party and State Officials Visit Changsong County
articles.content:
Senior Party and State Officials Visit Changsong County
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials including Choe Yong Rim and officials of party, ministries, national institutions and local party, power and economic bodies visited various places of Changsong County, North Phyongan Province on Wednesday on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the Changsong joint conference of local party and economic officials.
					 Changsong County is associated with the leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who opened up a wide road of developing local economy and improving the people's living standard by increasing the role of county as a regional base. 
					
					 The participants laid bunches of flowers before the newly erected mosaic depicting portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and made bows to them.
					
					 At the Changsong Revolutionary Museum, they looked round historic relics showing the efforts made by the President and Kim Jong Il who ushered in a new history of mountains of treasures, while giving field guidance to the county.
					
					 They also went to local industrial factories in Changsong including Foodstuff Factory, Foodstuff Processing Factory, Furniture Factory, Paper Mill, Jute Bag Factory and Okpho Stockbreeding Farm. 
					
					 They enjoyed a performance given by the art group of the county at its cultural hall.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks Anniversary of Changsong Joint Conference
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks Anniversary of Changsong Joint Conference
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held in Changsong County, North Phyongan Province on Wednesday to mark the 50th anniversary of the historic Changsong joint conference of local party and economic officials personally guided by President Kim Il Sung. 
					 The joint conference held in August 1962 was a meeting of significance as it indicated the way for bringing about a new turn in the development of local economy and improving people's living standard by increasing the role of county as a regional base for socialist construction. 
					
					 After the joint conference, the President in the work "Theses on the Socialist Rural Question in Our Country" considered it as an important issue of strategic significance in finally solving the rural problem and accelerating the socialist construction to increase the role of county and developed the theory on regional base in depth.
					
					 With the Changsong joint conference as an occasion, leader Kim Jong Il published works including "The Validity of Our Party's Policy on Developing Local Economy" and deeply proved the originality and validity of the President's idea and theory on the position and role of county and the development of local economy and developed and enriched them with new ideological and theoretical treasures.
					
					 Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to Changsong County on various occasions in the new century, making sure that Changsong County played a pioneer role in the development of local industry. 
					
					 The idea and policy clarified at the joint conference are being successfully implemented under the outstanding and experienced leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present at the meeting were senior party and state officials including Choe Yong Rim, Kim Ki Nam and Kim Phyong Hae, officials of ministries, national institutions, local party, power and economic bodies and working people.
					
					 Conveyed at the meeting was the work "Let Us Build All Counties into People's Paradise Good to Live in by Embodying Historic Spirit of Changsong Joint Conference" published by Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the Changsong joint conference. 
					
					 Premier of the Cabinet Choe Yong Rim, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, made a report.
					
					 (Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, made a report.)
					
					 The reporter said that thanks to the idea and leadership of the President and Kim Jong Il, all cities and counties including Changsong County took on new looks as administrative organizations at the lowest level and political bases to successfully ensure the unified and comprehensive guidance of the party and the state. He went on:
					
					 The DPRK has steadily advanced the drive to develop the local economy and improve the people's living standard, undeterred by any world-wide economic upheaval and the stringent economic blockade of the imperialists. This is a striking demonstration of the WPK's original idea of socialist construction and its wise leadership.
					
					 The reporter referred to the tasks for increasing the roles of the counties in every way to bring about a dramatic turn in the development of local economy and improve the people's living standard in hearty response to Kim Jong Un's work.

articles.title: National Seminar on Anniversary of Changsong Joint Conference
articles.content:
National Seminar on Anniversary of Changsong Joint Conference
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- A national seminar took place in Changsong County, North Phyongan Province, on Wednesday to mark the 50th anniversary of the historic Changsong joint conference of local party and economic officials personally guided by President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Present there were senior party and state officials including Choe Yong Rim, Kim Ki Nam and Kim Phyong Hae, officials of party, ministries, national institutions, local party, power organs and economic bodies and working people.
					
					 The seminar heard speeches made on the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for the development of the local industry and achievements gained in the industry. It discussed the tasks for remaining true to the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Choe Jong Gon, chairman of the North Phyongan Provincial People's Committee, at the seminar said that the Changsong joint conference marked a historic occasion as it helped bring about a signal turn in the development of the local industry and the improvement of the people's living standard by enhancing the county's role.
					
					 He noted that the period since the conference witnessed the appearance of many local industrial factories depending on locally available raw materials and resources in cities and counties of the province, a rapid increase in the production and such success as meeting the demands for most of consumer goods with its own products.
					
					 He noted that the county seat and farm villages were spruced up as required by the era of Songun and all areas of the province have developed evenly and overall standard of people's living in the city and farm villages improved.
					
					 Kim Chol Ung, chief secretary of the Changsong County Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, said that the development of Changsong is a brilliant fruition of the President and the leader who dedicated all their lives to the people, praising the undying feats performed by the peerlessly great men for the building of a rich and powerful country.
					
					 Kim Song Gon, chief secretary of the Hwaphyong County, Jagang Province, Committee of the WPK, in his speech referred to the fact that the torch lit by the President in Changsong County flared up across the country under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il and Hwaphyong County brought about a great change in the development of the economy and agriculture and the improvement of people's living standard.
					
					 The experience gained by his county shows that if a county works hard with ardent patriotic desire to make even a trifling thing serve its people, it can improve their living standard, he said.
					
					 Jo Won Thaek, manager of the Maengsan County Foodstuff Factory in South Phyongan Province, recalled that the last five decades since the conference fully proved the validity and vitality of the WPK's policy for developing the local economy to steadily improve the people's living standard.
					
					 Kim Jong Ha working at the Secretariat of the Cabinet said that Marshal Kim Jong Un made public the work on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the conference, providing a powerful ideological and moral weapon for dynamically stepping up the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 He called upon all the people to become patriots of practical ability in the effort to turn their residential areas into lands of bliss by embodying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.

articles.title: National Symposium on Medical Science Held
articles.content:
National Symposium on Medical Science Held
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- A national symposium on the medical science was held at the Grand People's Study House between August 7 and 8 to mark the 45th anniversary of the publication of the President Kim Il Sung's work "On Developing the Pharmaceutical and Medical Instrument Industries".
					 The work, published on June 6, 1967, specifies the task and ways for developing the pharmaceutical and medical instrument industries.
					
					 The symposium was held, divided into four panels such as pharmacy, Koryo medicine, pharmaceutics and medical instrument.
					
					 There presented about 380 treatises.
					
					 Some of them attracted interest of participants as they settled problems arising in studying and developing medicine and medical instrument and putting their production on a modern and scientific basis.

articles.title: Pig Farms Newly Built in Paekam County
articles.content:
Pig Farms Newly Built in Paekam County
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Pig farms were newly built in Tokpho area, Paekam County, Ryanggang Province of the DPRK.
					 The county pushed forward the project to build farms suited to the specific features of alpine area, and thus built tens of pig farms in a little more than two years.
					
					 The construction of pig farms made it possible to set up the rotation production system and bring about a radical turn in potato farming.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Arouses Patriotism among DPRK People
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Arouses Patriotism among DPRK People
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Upon receiving respected Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Effect Kim Jong Il's Patriotism and Step Up the Building of a Prosperous Country" released on August 3, all the people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have renewed their will to carry into reality the patriotic intention of the peerlessly great persons.
					 Ri Kil Song, an officer of the Korean People's Army, told KCNA:
					
					 "The work makes us recall the whole life of leader Kim Jong Il, who devoted himself to the prosperity of the country and the wellbeing of posterity with ardent patriotism.
					
					 His patriotic devotion was intensively expressed in defending the socialist Korea.
					
					 Under the banner of the Songun (military-first) politics, he had made an endless inspection of frontline military posts and worked heart and soul for strengthening the country's military muscles for scores of years in defence of the nation's destiny.
					
					 I will carry forward his patriotic cause with arms."
					
					 Pak Jong Min, a department director of the Ministry of Public Health, said:
					
					 "Leader Kim Jong Il's patriotic efforts brought about eye-catching achievements in this land.
					
					 He set a grandiose goal for building a thriving nation and made a long journey of field guidance to different units of the country, kindling the torch of industrial revolution in a new century and leading the dynamic drive for great upsurge.
					
					 Thanks to his patriotic devotion, the DPRK is now vigorously advancing towards the final victory, displaying its high dignity and might.
					
					 I will regard Kim Jong Il's patriotism as guidelines in my work."
					
					 Ri Yu Gyong, a student at Kim Chaek University of Technology, said:
					
					 "The work gives a glimpse of leader Kim Jong Il's great patriotism carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He feels Kim Jong Il's patriotism even in a blade of grass and a tree, inspiring all of us to follow it.
					
					 Always remembering the days when Kim Jong Un planted trees with servicepersons with much care and kindly took an old woman road-keeper by hands, I will prepare myself to be a genuine patriot in the Songun era."

articles.title: Production of Art Pieces Brisk among School Youth and Children
articles.content:
Production of Art Pieces Brisk among School Youth and Children
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- School youth and children across the DPRK have conducted brisk activities to create literary and art pieces for winning the April 15 Loyalty Mangyongdae Creation Prize.
					 During the period of mass literary and art pieces prize contests this year, more than 9,000 juvenile songs and poems, words of songs, lyrics, essays, fragmentary thoughts, etc. were presented, an increase of more than 1,000 from last year.
					
					 The works reflect the boundless reverence of the Korean people, including school youth and children, for Generalissimo Kim Il Sung.
					
					 There are works which impressively depict the devoted efforts and exploits performed by leader Kim Jong Il. They make readers look back with tears on the days of great loss to the nation.
					
					 Among them were literary and art pieces vividly reflecting the pledge of school youth and children to become young vanguard of Songun and children's guard intensely loyal to the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Selected were many works dealing with the desire and enthusiasm of school youth and children across the country to embody Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
					
					 A ceremony of awarding the above-said prize took place at the Central Youth Hall on Wednesday.

articles.title: KCNA Report on Kim Jong Il's Journeys for Patriotic Devotion (2)
articles.content:
KCNA Report on Kim Jong Il's Journeys for Patriotic Devotion (2)
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il visited servicepersons and workers displaying exceptionally high patriotic zeal to highly praise them for performing feats and warmly encourage them in their devoted efforts, reposing deep trust in them and showing warm loving care for them.
					 The revolutionary soldier spirit and the Kanggye spirit were created at a time when there was warm affection between the leader and his soldiers and all the service members and people turned out as one in hearty response to the leader's patriotic call.
					
					 Flames of Hamnam, the flames of all-out charge flared up in the wake of the kindling of the Songgang, Ranam and Kangson torches. These changes resulted in remarkably augmenting the ideological and mental power of the people in the DPRK.
					
					 He initiated the Three-Revolution Red Flag Movement and developed it into an all-people patriotic movement. This period witnessed the appearance of more than three million standard-bearers of the three-revolution, which brought about a new turn in the ideological and moral traits and work-style of people.
					
					 Saying the "Patriotic Song" is the DPRK national anthem unlike other countries, he granted the precious title of "patriot" to the martyrs who laid down their lives while fighting for the country and named the martyrs cemetery "Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery". He made sure that former unconverted long-term prisoners who remained true to their faith as revolutionaries for decades are called pro-reunification patriots and many factories of the country built with the sincerity of overseas Korean businessmen shine with the word of patriotism.
					
					 He saw to it that alma maters of the heroes who dedicated their youth in their twenties and thirties to the country were renamed after them and their busts were erected there so that the whole country might learn from their spiritual world. Tens of thousands of heroes and men of meritorious service were produced in the era of Songun under his loving care.
					
					 The DPRK has turned into a large harmonious family in which all its members help each other and lead each other forward. People do not hesitate to donate their blood and flesh to their revolutionary comrades and take care of war veterans, disabled honored soldiers and orphans as their kith and kin in the noble spirit of "One for all and all for one!" This is a product of the Workers' Party of Korea's politics of love for the country and its people.
					
					 The revolutionary military songs sung by the State Merited Chorus during the Arduous March resounded far and wide as a sound of bugle for advance in the times.
					
					  Art performances given by service members and military families, concerts by the Unhasu Orchestra, light comedy "An Echo among the Hills", drama "We Will Recollect Today", etc. instilled ardent patriotism into all service members and people.

articles.title: Papers Call for Making Country Prosperous
articles.content:
Papers Call for Making Country Prosperous
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Papers Wednesday editorially call upon all the Korean people to thoroughly embody the idea and spirit of the Changsong joint conference under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea in order to decisively improve the people's living standard and make the country more prosperous. 
					 Today marks the 50th anniversary of "Let Us Radically Improve the People's Living Standards by Strengthening the Role of the County and Further Developing Local Industry and Agriculture", the historic concluding speech made by President Kim Il Sung at the Changsong joint conference of local party and economic officials. 
					
					 The President enunciated the idea on the position and role of the county for the first time in history and put forward an original policy for increasing the role of the county in order to further develop local industry and agriculture and improve the people's living standard. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 The idea and spirit of the Changsong joint conference which called for increasing the role of the county to comprehensively develop local economy, education and culture serve as a banner to be held aloft in the on-going general onward movement to build an economic power of the 21st century and a highly civilized socialist country.
					
					 Thanks to the Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's patriotic will to dedicate themselves to their country and people and their indefatigable leadership, the idea and the spirit of the Changsong joint conference have demonstrated the great attraction and vitality over the past five decades. 
					
					 The role of the county has been markedly increased in socialist construction and great progress made in the development of local industry and agriculture with the Changsong joint conference as an occasion. A dynamic nation-wide campaign has been under way to carry out important tasks set forth at the joint conference. As a result, a large number of local industrial establishments have been built in all cities and counties and their material and technical foundations have become stronger than ever before. 
					
					The nation's mountains in different parts of the country have turned into those of treasures thanks to the fervent patriotic zeal of all people. A massive drive to breed grass-eating animals has brought about a dramatic turn in the development of stockbreeding.
					
					 Many local industrial factories have been equipped with latest production facilities to mass-produce quality consumer goods in reliance upon their solid raw material bases. 
					
					 In the crucible of the industrial revolution in the new century, all counties are carrying on their construction under clear-cut long-term plans and phased plans.
					
					 The history of turning mountains into those of treasures is given steady continuity and a fresh turn is being effected in the development of local industry under the outstanding leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un who is glorifying the undying patriotic exploits of the great Generalissimos.
					
					 Minju Joson calls upon all the people to emerge proud victors in the on-going honorable drive to build a socialist country of bliss on this land.

articles.title: US, South Korea Can Never Escape Responsibility for Terrorism
articles.content:
US, South Korea Can Never Escape Responsibility for Terrorism
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean authorities should bear in mind that there is no other way out for them but to make an official apology for their attempted politically- motivated terrorism aimed to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and severely punish the prime movers.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday holds this in a bylined article.
					
					 The U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea are working hard to cover up the truth about the attempted terrorism, far from apologizing for their hideous crime before history and the nation, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 With neither rhetoric nor sophism can the criminals of history evade the responsibility for this hideous crime. The testimony made by the arrested terrorist and facts and information disclosed later provide objective evidence revealing the true colors of the U.S. and the Lee regime as chieftains of terrorism.
					
					 The hideous terrorism intended to blow up the inviolable statues and grand monuments in the DPRK is part of the vicious scenarios for terrorism committed by the U.S. and its puppet regime against the DPRK for the last several decades. Their gruesome terrorism was kicked off with the bombing incident which took place at the South Phyongan Provincial celebration of the 27th anniversary of the March First Popular Uprising at Pyongyang Railway Station Square on March 1, 1946. Their terrorism went on during the Fatherland Liberation War with indiscriminate air raids on the supreme command of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The Lee regime is playing a trick to cover up the truth about the case but this only helps self-expose that of its crimes.

articles.title: "Saenuri Party's" Political Swindle Censured by Minju Joson
articles.content:
"Saenuri Party's" Political Swindle Censured by Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The DPRK demanded the south Korean puppet regime make an official apology for the attempted heinous state-sponsored, politically-motivated terrorism against the DPRK and sternly punish the prime movers. However, the clan of the "Saenuri Party" of south Korea let loose a spate of balderdash urging the DPRK to "apologize" for the "Cheonan" warship sinking case and the Yonphyong Island shelling case while describing the DPRK's just demand as "provocation".
					 Minju Joson says in a bylined commentary Wednesday in this regard:
					
					 This is a base politically-motivated swindle to divert elsewhere the mindset of south Koreans enraged at the said terrorism, and another provocation against the DPRK.
					
					 Now the south Korean people have risen up in the massive struggle to judge the "Saenuri Party" which derailed the inter-Korean relations and resorted to the moves to ignite a war in league with foreign forces while pursuing the unpopular rule hand in hand with traitor Lee Myung Bak. If the regime admits and apologizes for the terrorism, the people's sentiment against the "Saenuri Party" will run higher and, accordingly, its dream to stay in power will end up in smoke. That is why the clan of the "Saenuri Party" is slandering the DPRK's just demand, pretending that it has nothing to do with the terrorism.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will make the clan of the "Saenuri Party" pay for its ungrounded invectives escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen. The clan would be well advised to stop acting rashly, not belatedly repenting of its act.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slashes at Japanese Authorities' Policy Subservient to US
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slashes at Japanese Authorities' Policy Subservient to US
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The Japanese government finally introduced "MV-22 Osprey", new-type VTOL transport of the U.S. forces, despite the strong protest and opposition of various circles at home. Shortly ago, the shipped transports were deployed at the Iwaguni U.S. base in Yamaguchi Prefecture.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a bylined commentary observes in this regard:
					
					 This is a product of Japan's attitude of yielding to the U.S. pressure. 
					
					"MV-22 Osprey" is being censured and rejected not only in the U.S. but in other countries for its frequent crashes. 
					
					 Japanese people are trembling with fear that Ospreys may crash over their heads while flying.
					
					 The Japanese government is busy forming experts groups and the like under the plea of "confirming safety of the plane."
					
					 This is nothing but a foolish and ridiculous artifice to calm down the public anger even a bit.
					
					 The present Japanese authorities finally allowed the introduction of such plane after being driven to such political cliff. This is little short of digging their own graves.
					
					 Poor and pitiful is Japan's plight as it has to read its American master's face, subservient to him.
					
					 It is the intention of Japan to realize its ambition for turning itself into a military giant by pleasing the U.S. through the purchase of such transports.
					
					 It is, however, nothing but a pipedream for Japan to realize its scenarios for turning it into a military giant and realizing overseas expansion by pursuing such policy servile to the U.S.
					
					 The Japanese authorities would be well advised to behave themselves, cogitating what contempt and shame their policy would bring to their country and what consequences would be entailed by it.

articles.title: Japan's Moves for Dispatching Troops for Overseas Aggression under Fire
articles.content:
Japan's Moves for Dispatching Troops for Overseas Aggression under Fire
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The U.S.-led multinational mine-sweeping exercises will be staged in Persian Gulf in mid-September. In this regard the Japanese Ministry of Defense decided some days ago to dispatch a mine-sweeping unit of the Maritime "Self-Defense Force". Japan is making poor excuses that it is aimed at "contributing to defending the security of major sea lanes".
					 Minju Joson says in a bylined commentary on Wednesday in this regard:
					
					 This is nothing but a deception to loosen the vigilance of world public against Japan's dispatch of military forces.
					
					 Talking about so-called "rule of law", Japan is mulling dispatching its armed forces to the Persian Gulf area far away from it in breach of the "Pacifist Constitution" which disallows its military activities abroad and exercise of the right of collective self-defense.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, the situation in the Persian Gulf area is not directly linked with Japan's security. 
					
					 Japan is a war criminal state which was defeated while getting hell-bent on aggression of other countries and plunder of colonies in the past. It committed before the international community not to have the army as armed forces for aggression but abandon the right to war and confine military activities entirely to defense of the country. But the Japanese reactionaries are taking the road for overseas expansion in an undisguised way, throwing away the commitment like an old pair of shoes.
					
					 Any "international contribution" touted by Japan is, in essence, a grave threat and provocation against world peace and security.
					
					 They should stop at once the criminal act of seeking overseas expansion under the deceptive slogans of "peace" and "security".

articles.title: Korean Scholar in US Praises Kim Jong Un's Greatness
articles.content:
Korean Scholar in US Praises Kim Jong Un's Greatness
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Sonu Hak Won, a Korean scholar in the U.S., made public an article reflecting his impressions of works of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					 He was impressed with "Let's Dynamically Struggle for a Final Victory, Holding Aloft the Banner of Songun", speech made by Kim Jong Un at the military parade for celebrating the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung on April 15, 2012 and "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People", the treatise published on April 20, the article said.
					
					 What impressed him first is the President's idea on the popular masses, it said, adding:
					
					 The second is an understanding of the Juche idea founded by the President.
					
					 The Juche idea is an encyclopedic revolutionary idea representing the entire history of accomplishing the cause of independence, socialist cause of the popular masses, and a great idea leading humankind to the future.
					
					 The DPRK is strong as it is based on the Juche idea.
					
					 The third is independence.
					
					  It was the national independence that the President emphasized before anything else when he provided the three charters for national reunification.
					
					 It was his firm stand and the principled stand of the north that the country's reunification should be realized independently with neither reliance on outside forces nor interference by them.
					
					 The fourth is comradeship.
					
					 The fifth is the Songun political idea.
					
					 Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un highly praised the Songun politics pursued by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Thanks to the Songun politics, a small country prevented pressure of big powers and ushered in the June 15 era of reunification. 
					
					 Every line of Kim Jong Un's works helps realize that he is a great man who has successfully carried forward the revolutionary cause of the President and Kim Jong Il, the article said, absolutely supporting him.

articles.title: Korean Artiste in US Praises Concert Given by Moranbong Band
articles.content:
Korean Artiste in US Praises Concert Given by Moranbong Band
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Korean artiste in the U.S. Ri Jun Mu, chief of the Uruk Symphony Orchestra, posted an article praising the debut concert given by the Moranbong Band on the Internet homepage of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. on July 23.
					 People across the world lavished praises on the debut concert given by the Moranbong Band, being admired by the Juche-based art of the DPRK, the article said, adding:
					
					 This breaking concert let the world clearly know the source of the might and pluck of the DPRK, which is advancing towards the final victory, wining victory after victory.
					
					 Only 10 odd performers presented solemn and rich sound that can be produced only by a grand symphony orchestra with their skillful and smart rendition, mesmerizing the audience.
					
					 The truth of the preposition "Keep your feet firmly planted on this land and look out over the world" put forth by Kim Jong Il, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, was comprehensively represented in the concert.
					
					 The concert was, indeed, a song of victory of the DPRK over the imperialists in acute showdown with them.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the DPRK NDC, said the military technological superiority is no longer a monopoly of the imperialists and the days are gone never to return when the imperialists threatened and blackmailed the DPRK with A-bombs.
					
					 The DPRK vividly showed the capitalist countries what the Juche-based art is like through the above-said concert.
					
					 It was a touching concert full of the invincible spirit of the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK Successes at Olympics Given Wide Publicity by Foreign Media
articles.content:
DPRK Successes at Olympics Given Wide Publicity by Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The achievements made by DPRK sportspersons at the 30th Olympic Games were widely reported by foreign media between August 1 and 3.
					 Yangzi Wanbao of China said in an article titled "DPRK weightlifters stun the world":
					
					 The mysterious DPRK team grabbed three gold medals in weightlifting event alone in a few days since the opening of the London Olympics, startling the world. The DPRK team does not return home with empty hands at each big tournament.
					
					 Zhongguo Qingnian Bao said the tactics of the DPRK's weightlifting team can be considered as very prudent. This yielded very good fruits, it noted.
					
					 Huan Qiu Shibao and Cankao Xiaoxi of China and ITAR-TASS pointed out that the news of the victory of DPRK players is creating sensation among people, adding Olympic zeal is prevalent in the DPRK.
					
					 Japanese papers said the factor of successes made by the DPRK team is the education of talents peculiar to it. There is a well-regulated system for training children with sporting skill in the DPRK. 
					
					 Reuters, BBC, VOA, the Nepalese paper Majodur and Internet website of the France-Korea Friendship Association reported that DPRK players are unexpectedly grabbing gold medals one by one, attrracting world attention. Media are unsparing in their praises of DPRK players breaking world records, they added.
					
					 A U.S. Internet paper said that the DPRK is the real winner of the current Olympics. It went on:
					
					 The fairest method of rating countries in the number of gold medals is to count that of medals per the number of players from each participating country. In that sense, the DPRK placed first. It overwhelmingly tops the list of the countries in the size of their population.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Kuwaiti Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Kuwaiti Paper
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The Kuwaiti paper Al-Rai on August 2 carried a detailed content of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification"
					 The work, made public on August 4, 1997, deals with the undying feats President Kim Il Sung performed for national reunification and formulates the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as three charters for national reunification.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks and ways for accomplishing the cause for national reunification on the basis of the charters.

articles.title: DPRK Leaders Lauded by Democratic Congolese Organization
articles.content:
DPRK Leaders Lauded by Democratic Congolese Organization
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo published a bulletin on August 1 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification".
					 The bulletin carried articles titled "Just and fair proposals for national reunification advanced by President Kim Il Sung" and "Life for national reunification".
					
					 It elaborated on huge efforts made by Kim Il Sung to leave a reunified country with the coming generations, considerate of the nation suffering from division.
					
					 Kim Jong Il formulated the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification and provided the June 15 north-south joint declaration, it noted.
					
					 It said that Korea could not be reunified as the traitorous Lee Myung Bak regime has been engrossed in the moves against reunification, obsessed by the idea of relying on foreign forces, and the U.S. has intensified the moves against the DPRK.
					
					 It expressed belief that the people of the DPRK will foil the moves of the anti-reunification forces inside and outside and surely achieve the reunification of the country.

articles.title: Three Charters for Reunification Supported by International Community
articles.content:
Three Charters for Reunification Supported by International Community
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The international community has positively supported the three charters for national reunification formulated by leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The three charters for national reunification consist of the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo.
					
					 A Senegalese paper said that it is a supreme task for the Korean nation suffering from more than half a century-long division to reunify the country.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Today they are provided with the firm guidelines for national reunification, the three charters for national reunification which were advanced by President Kim Il Sung and formulated by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They clearly set forth the fundamental principles and ways for reunification and, therefore, grasped the hearts of the Korean people and encouraged the entire Korean nation to accomplish the cause of national reunification.
					
					 The Pakistani paper Baluchistan Times said that Korea's reunification is to establish national sovereignty on a national scale, connect the severed blood vessel of the divided nation and achieve its unity.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea noted in its statement that the world progressive people who love peace and justice are positively supporting the charters, praising them as the most fair and aboveboard reunification programme for the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.
					
					 The Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea said that the three charters for national reunification gave a bright prospect to the Korean people struggling for national reunification and the world progressives supporting Korea's reunification.

articles.title: DPRK's Stand Supported by British, Peruvian Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK's Stand Supported by British, Peruvian Organizations
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association issued a joint statement supporting a statement of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK on July 29.
					 The statement condemned the state-sponsored, politically-motivated hideous terrorism against DPRK by the U.S. imperialists and their bootlicker, the south Korean fascist regime.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 With no denial, excuse or trick can they conceal their serious crime.
					
					 The U.S. is a den in which the terrorist acts against other countries are being planned and executed.
					
					 We support the just and revolutionary stand of the DPRK clarified in the statement of the DPRK NDC.
					
					 It is natural for the DPRK to have steadily developed the means for self-defence including nuclear deterrent.
					
					 The DPRK will make leaping advance forward under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism issued a statement on July 30.
					
					 The hideous terrorism against the DPRK was planned by the U.S. to impair the authority of the great leaders of the DPRK and undercut the absolute trust of the Korean people in them, the statement said.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The U.S. said it is not hostile to the DPRK but actually it is just the opposite.
					
					 The U.S. is the base for international state-sponsored, politically-motivated terrorism.
					
					 The people of the DPRK armed with the Juche idea will smash at one blow any war provocation of the U.S. and its puppet forces in south Korea.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam expresa agradecimiento a Truong Tan Sang
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam expresa agradecimiento a Truong Tan Sang
Pyongyang, 8 de agosto (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea Kim Yong Nam, al partir de la Republica Socialista de Vietnam despues de concluir su visita, envio el dia 7 un mensaje de agradecimiento al presidente Truong Tan Sang.
					El remitente expreso el profundo agradecimiento al presidente y el pueblo vietnamita que les acogieron con hospitalidad.
					
					Senalo que en esta ocasion ambas partes intercambiaron las opiniones sobre los asuntos de desarrollar activamente las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion de larga tradicion entre los dos partidos, dos Estados y los pueblos de los dos paises conforme a los ideales e intereses comunes, y otros de interes mutuo y llegaron a un acuerdo.
					
					Dijo que el encuentro de esta vez servira de un motivo importante para promover el desarrollo de las relaciones bilaterales y expreso su conviccion de que las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises se ampliaran y se desarrollaran mas segun los esfuerzos comunes.
					
					Deseo que el amistoso y hermano pueblo vietnamita logre mayores exitos en la lucha por realizar con anticipacion la causa de industrializacion y modernizacion del pais materializando la resolucion de la XI Conferencia del Partido Comunista de Vietnam y el presidente tenga buena salud y felicidad y obtenga gran exito en el cumplimiento de su deber importante.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam  arriba  a Vientiane
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam  arriba  a Vientiane
Vientiane, 7 de agosto (Corresponsal de ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, arribo el dia 7 a Vientiane para realizar una visita oficial y de amistad  a Laos cumplimentando la invitacion de Choummaly Sayasone, presidente de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao. 
					Le acompanan el ministro de Comercio Exterior, Ri Ryong Nam, el ministro de Industria Extractiva, Kang Min Chol, el vicecanciller Kung Sok Ung y otros acompanantes.
					
					El mismo dia, Kim y su comitiva salieron de Vietnam.

articles.title: IRP denuncia actos de secuestro, terrorismo y sabotaje contra la RPDC
articles.content:
IRP denuncia actos de secuestro, terrorismo y sabotaje contra la RPDC
Pyongyang, 8 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Instituto de la Reunificacion de la Patria (IRP) dio a luz el dia 7 un acta para revelar a todo el mundo los verdaderos aspectos de la campana anti-RPDC que lanzan EE.UU. y la banda de titeres surcoreanos usando todos los medios sucios como rapto, secuestro, complot, terrorismo, sabotaje y subversion.
					Segun el texto, cuando fracaso su intento de aplastar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea mediante el bloqueo, la sancion y la presion militar de varios decenios, EE.UU. trata ahora de derrocarla comenzando por desestabilizar su interior.
					
					En una rueda de prensa en abril de este ano, la autoridad de la diplomacia surcoreana reconocio publicamente que EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas vinieron orientando su "politica sobre el Norte de Corea" principalmente a la renuncia de armas nucleares y misiles, pero, decidieron perseguir desde ahora el "nuevo metodo de acercamiento al Norte" enfocado en el "derrocamiento de su regimen".
					
					Tiene 4 etapas el plan trazado para ese fin tomando en cuenta la inexistencia de las fuerzas disidentes organizadas. 
					
					Primera, raptar y seducir a los norcoreanos y darles el curso de terrorismo y sabotaje; segunda, mandarlos nuevamente a la RPDC con la mision de formar las fuerzas disidentes; tercera, proveerles armas para que realicen actos terroristas y de sabotaje y armen una sublevacion armada; cuarta, EE.UU. derrocaria finalmente el regimen norcoreano interviniendo militarmente bajo el pretexto de la "situacion de emergencia" y la "defensa de derechos humanos".
					
					Desde hace mucho tiempo, el imperio norteamericano viene practicando el rapto en las fronteras colindantes con la zona norte de la RPDC por conducto de la "Fundacion Nacional por la Democracia", disfrazada de organizacion civil.
					
					Por su parte, la "Fundacion Nacional por la Democracia" incorpora en el secuestro de norcoreanos a las entidades surcoreanas que se dedican a los complots anti-RPDC, tales como la "Alianza civil por derechos humanos en el Norte", "Network por la democratizacion en el Norte", "Duri Hana", etc.
					
					Para financiar las actividades de esas ellas, EE.UU. desembolsa anualmente mas de 20 millones de US$.
					
					Al describir como "labores para la salida planificada del Norte de Corea" la seduccion y el traslado de los habitantes norcoreanos, los titeres surcoreanos no ocultan siquiera el caracter organizado de esas practicas de rapto.
					
					Llegan a 397 millones de US$ los fondos malgastados hasta ahora por la camarilla titere de Lee Myung Bak en esa sucia operacion. (Fuente: "Saram Ilbo" del 16 de mayo de 2012).
					
					En nordeste de China, cumplen esa mision mas de 3 mil agentes surcoreanos infiltrados en condicion de misionero.
					
					Chon Ki Won, disfrazado de misionero de la sociedad religiosa "Duri Hana", confeso que durante 19 anos de 1990 a 2009, habia llevado al Sur de Corea a mas de 900 norcoreanos.
					
					En marzo del ano en curso, varios tipos inclusive Kim Yong Hwan, caudillo de una entidad de conspiracion anti-RPDC y peor traidor, fueron arrestados por las autoridades de Seguridad Publica de China en la region nordeste de este pais mientras cometian actos de rapto y terrorismo contra los norcoreanos.
					
					En el caso de que sea dificil llevarlos directo al Sur de Corea, los trasladan a un tercer pais.
					
					Tomandolos como rehenes, EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos chantajean a sus familiares y parientes para que estos "salgan ilegalmente" en masas del pais.
					
					Esta en apogeo el secuestro que se comete bajo el cartel de "intercambio de familiares separados en terceros paises".
					
					EE.UU. y la camarilla titere surcoreana llevan por la fuerza al Sur de Corea a los norcoreanos que sufrieron naufragio en el mar.
					
					Los trasladados al Sur de Corea se deforman ante la imposibilidad de ganarse la vida y optan por dedicarse a la delincuencia, suicidarse o fugar de nuevo al tercer pais.
					
					En cooperacion con EE.UU., los titeres surcoreanos lanzan a los fugitivos norcoreanos y peores traidores a las maniobras de conspiracion, sabotaje y subversion contra la RPDC.
					
					Actualmente, llegan a mas de 300 las entidades fundadas con esos elementos.
					
					Los connotados traidores seleccionados reciben en EE.UU. la educacion y el entrenamiento especiales mientras las entidades anti-RPDC suministran a las autoridades titeres surcoreanas las informaciones secretas de la RPDC recogidas.
					
					Las autoridades titeres surcoreanas instigan a las entidades de desertores connotados incluyendo la "Federacion del Movimiento por el Norte Libre", a difamar severamente la maxima dignidad de la RPDC, divulgar los volantes o pronunciar discursos radiales tergiversando y calumniando el regimen y la politica socialistas de ella.
					
					Ascienden a decenas de millones los volantes de ese tipo esparcidos en cientos de ocasiones.
					
					En septiembre de 2008, el entonces presidente norteamericano Bush llamo a la Casa Blanca a Pak Sang Hak, representante de la "Federacion de Movimiento por el Norte Libre" que estuvo al frente de lanzamiento de volantes de contenido anti-RPDC y le estimulo diciendo que "el esta cumpliendo la tarea dificil por la libertad del Norte" y que "no pierda animo".
					
					EE.UU. hace a los peores traidores a hablar mal de la RPDC en la Casa Blanca, el congreso y la ONU y hasta les concede el "premio de derechos humanos" a los que hayan repetido sus dictados.
					
					La banda titere surcoreana suministra cada ano mas de diez millones de dolares a las entidades de DDHH anti-RPDC para que publicaran la llamada "carta blanca de derechos humanos en el Norte" y realizaran la "investigacion de la situacion de derechos humanos en el Norte". (Fuente: Thongil News del 6 de octubre de 2010)
					
					Circula el video de la llamada "situacion actual de derechos humanos del Norte", que recoge las declaraciones no apegadas a la realidad de los desertores traidores y organiza casi todos los dias las exposiciones fotograficas y seminarios para escandalizar el tema de "DDHH del Norte".
					
					Con el apoyo de las autoridades surcoreanas, se filman y se proyectan las peliculas que cuestionan el mismo tema con datos tergiversados.
					
					EE.UU. y la banda titere surcoreana libran la guerra psicologica por medio de las cadenas radiales anti-RPDC operadas por los fugitivos norcoreanos, tales como la "Radio del Norte libre", la "Radio para el cambio del Norte", la "Radio de Corea libre" y la "Voz de la llanura".
					
					EE.UU. cito en varias ocasiones a la Casa Blanca a Kim Song Min (Kim Jin, nombre real), representante de la "Radio del Norte Libre", y le ordeno que  "siga infundiendo en el interior del Norte la corriente de liberalizacion". (Segun despachos del 2 de mayo de 2008 de Yonhap News)
					
					EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos organizaron el "cuerpo suicida" incorporando a los peores fugitivos norcoreanos y lo empuja a diversos atentados terroristas y acciones de sabotaje y subversion anti-RPDC.
					
					Por ejemplo, el "Frente por la Liberacion del Pueblo Norcoreano", fundado en septiembre de 2010, toma por su mision la recogida de informaciones sobre el Norte, la destruccion de importantes instalaciones de ella, el terrorismo.
					
					Ese frente esta involucrado directamente en el recien descubierto atentado terrorista para destruir las estatuas de bronce y los monumentos erigidos en la RPDC como simbolo de maxima dignidad de esta.
					
					Ademas, operan actualmente en el Sur de Corea otras bandas terroristas como la "Alianza de militares para el Norte libre" y la recien descubierta "Sociedad para destruir las estatuas de bronce".
					
					Un desertor norcoreano, que se habia incorporado a esa ultima entidad, confeso que habia trazado el plan de destruir la casa natal (del Dirigente        Kim Jong Il) en el campamento secreto del monte Paektu, pero lo desistio por el reforzamiento de vigilancia y la dificultad de introducir en la region del Norte los materiales explosivos. (Segun Dong-A Ilbo - el 21 de julio de 2012).
					
					Los hechos comprueban que llegan a la etapa alarmante el secuestro de los norcoreanos por parte de EE.UU. y la banda del traidor Lee y su conspiracion y atentados terroristas anti-RPDC.
					
					Ellos deben actuar con prudencia teniendo presente la advertencia de la RPDC y suspender todos sus imprudentes actos criminales, inclusive el terrorismo politico de Estado de mayor magnitud.

articles.title: Acto central por 50o aniversario de Conferencia Conjunta de Changsong
articles.content:
Acto central por 50o aniversario de Conferencia Conjunta de Changsong
Pyongyang, 8 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 8 en el distrito de Changsong de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte el acto central por el 50o aniversario de la historica Conferencia Conjunta de Changsong de los Trabajadores Locales del Partido y de la Economia, dirigida por el Presidente          Kim Il Sung.
					La conferencia convocada en agosto de 1962 fue una reunion significativa que ilumino el camino radiante para registrar nuevo viraje en el desarrollo de la economia local y la mejora de la vida del pueblo al elevar el papel del distrito, base de la region, y trajo asi un viraje en la construccion socialista.
					
					El Presidente, despues de la citada conferencia, publico la obra "Tesis sobre el problema rural socialista en nuestro pais", en que presento elevar el papel del distrito como cuestion de importancia estrategica para solucionar cabalmente el problema rural y acelerar la construccion socialista, y profundizo y desarrollo la teoria sobre la base de la region.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il publico la obra "La justeza de la linea de nuestro partido sobre el desarrollo de la economia local" con motivo de la conferencia conjunta de Changsong y otras en que argumento profundamente la originalidad y la justeza de la idea y teoria del Presidente sobre la posicion y el papel del distrito y el desarrollo de la economia local y las desarrollo y enriquecio como nuevos componentes ideo-teoricos.
					
					En el nuevo siglo, el Dirigente realizo en varias ocasiones la direccion en el terreno sobre el distrito de Changsong y le hizo cumplir el papel vanguardista en el desarrollo de la industria local.
					
					La idea y la linea de la conferencia brillan hoy gracias a la destacada y probada direccion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					
					Al acto asistieron Choe Yong Rim, Kim Ki Nam, Kim Phyong Hae y otros cuadros directivos del partido y el Estado, los funcionarios del partido, ministerios, organos centrales y de las instituciones locales del partido, el Poder y la economia, asi como los trabajadores.
					
					En la ocasion, se dio lectura a la obra del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un publicada con motivo del 50o aniversario de la Conferencia Conjunta de Changsong "Transformemos todos los distritos como paraiso del pueblo materializando el espiritu de la historica Conferencia Conjunta de Changsong".
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y premier, Choe Yong Rim.
					
					El informante subrayo que gracias a la idea y la direccion del Presidente y el Dirigente, hoy, el distrito de Changsong y todas las ciudades y distritos renovaron sus perfiles como unidad administrativa de base y centro politico y pudieron poner con exito en la practica la orientacion unificada y general del partido y el Estado.
					
					Enfatizo que Corea continua sin parar la lucha por desarrollar la economia local y mejorar la vida del pueblo sin vacilacion alguna ante la fluctuacion economica de alcance global y las perversas maniobras de los imperialistas de bloqueo y sancion, lo que sirve de demostracion patente de la sensatez de la original idea del PTC sobre la construccion socialista y de su direccion.
					
					Presento las tareas para elevar en todo lo posible el papel del distrito y lograr viraje decisivo en el desarrollo de la economia local y la mejora de la vida del pueblo, segun las exigencias de la nueva obra del Maximo Dirigente.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica Japon por sumision ciega a EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica Japon por sumision ciega a EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 8 de agosto (ACNC) -- Pese a las fuertes protestas de distintos sectores del pais, Japon introdujo por fin los aviones de transporte "MV-22 Ospreys" de marca estadounidense y los desplego en la base de las tropas norteamericanas enclavada en Iwakuni de Departamento de Yamaguchi.
					Esto es el fruto de la postura sumisa a EE.UU.
					
					Asi subraya el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este miercoles y continua:
					
					"MV-22 Ospreys" es el avion de transporte condenado y rechazado por otros paises por el incidente de caida frecuente.
					
					En la actualidad, los habitantes japoneses temen por la inquietud de que ojala estos aviones caigan sobre sus cabezas en medio de vuelo.
					
					El gobierno japones arman alboroto para organizar el grupo de especialistas bajo el rotulo de "averiguacion de la seguridad" de esos aviones, lo que no pasa de ser una actitud absurda para calmar, aunque sea minima, la indignacion del pueblo.
					
					 A decir verdad, el que  las autoridades japonesas arrinconadas por la crisis politica permitieron la introduccion de estos aviones significa cavar la tumba de autodestruccion.
					
					Vivir obedeciendo y sondeando a su amo gringo es la situacion miserable de Japon.
					
					Adulando a EE.UU. con la compra de los dichos aviones, Japon trata vanamente de realizar su ambicion de la potencia militar y la expansion al ultramar.
					
					Japon debe actuar con prudencia dandose clara cuenta de las consecuencias que se emanen de su politica sumisa a EE.UU.
